DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect vitamin E fortify whey drink nutritional status , inflammatory marker oxidative stress hemodialysis patient
DOC.brief_title: Effect Vitamin E Fortified Whey Drink Nutritional , Inflammatory Oxidative Markers Hemodialysis Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The aim interventional study evaluate effect vitamin E fortify whey drink nutritional status , inflammatory marker oxidative stress hemodialysis patient . 92 hemodialysis patient select study . Inclusion criterion include : mean age 17-65 year old ; mild , moderate severe malnutrition base SGA ( subjective global assessment ) assessment ; dialyze least 2 time week 3 month . Exclusion criterion include : hospitalization last month ; active infection ; use immunosuppressant drug multi-vitamins ; pregnancy . The Ethics Committee Shiraz University Medical Sciences review approve protocol study.Informed consent sign participate study . Weight height patient record BMI ( body mass index ) calculation . Then , patient assign 4 group : 1. consumption 220 milliliter whey drink three time week , 2. consumption 220 milliliter whey drink fortify 400 milligram vitamin E three time week , 3. consumption 400 milligram vitamin E three time week , 4. control group : intervention . Patients follow 2 month . At begin end 2-month intervention period , 10 milliliter blood take patient nutritional status patient assess primary outcome . Serum level malondialdehyde , c-reactive protein , albumin , transferrin lipoprotein also measure . SGA , MIS SF-12 questionnaire fill patient begin end study .
DOC.criteria: mean age 1765 year old ; mild , moderate severe malnutrition base SGA ( subjective global assessment ) assessment ; dialyze least 2 time week 3 month hospitalization last month ; active infection ; use immunosuppressant drug multivitamin ; pregnancy , consume whey soy product
